results.title: Simvastatin attenuates stroke-induced splenic atrophy and lung susceptibility to spontaneous bacterial infection in mice.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Results provide the first direct experimental evidence that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ ameliorates @DISEASE_Stroke @DISEASE_MESH:D020521 @@@stroke@@@-induced peripheral immunodepression by attenuating @<m>DISEASE_Splenic_Neoplasms</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013160 @@@spleen atrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Lung_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung@@@ @DISEASE_Bacterial_Infections @DISEASE_MESH:D001424 @@@bacterial infection@@@.

citations.NLM: Jin R, Zhu X, Liu L, Nanda A, Granger DN, Li G. Simvastatin attenuates stroke-induced splenic atrophy and lung susceptibility to spontaneous bacterial infection in mice. Stroke. 2013 Apr;44(4):1135-43. PMID: 23391769
